item.title: Avatar
item.description: Besides the native features of img, support lazy load, custom placeholder and load failure, etc. Basic Usage Indicate how the image should be resized to fit its container by fit...
item.content:encoded:
Besides the native features of img, support lazy load, custom placeholder and load failure, etc.

Basic Usage

Indicate how the image should be resized to fit its container by fit, same as native object-fit.

item.title: Button
item.description: Commonly used button. Basic usage Use type, plain, round and circle to define Button's style. Viwer Source Code Loading Button Click the button to load data, then the button dis...
item.content:encoded:
Commonly used button.

Basic usage

Use type, plain, round and circle to define Button's style.

item.title: Date Picker
item.description: Use format to control displayed text's format in the input box. Use value-format to control binding value's format. By default, the component accepts and emits a Date object. Ch...
item.content:encoded:
Use `format` to control displayed text's `format` in the input box. Use `value-format` to control binding value's format.

By default, the component accepts and emits a Date object.

Check the list here of all available formats of Day.js.

Note

Pay attention to capitalization

item.title: Image
item.description: Besides the native features of img, support lazy load, custom placeholder and load failure, etc. Basic Usage Indicate how the image should be resized to fit its container by fit...
item.content:encoded:
Besides the native features of img, support lazy load, custom placeholder and load failure, etc.

Basic Usage

Indicate how the image should be resized to fit its container by fit, same as native object-fit.

item.title: Number
item.description: Input numerical values with a customizable range. Basic usage Bind a variable to v-model in element and you are set. When inputting invalid string to the input box, input value ...
item.content:encoded:
Input numerical values with a customizable range.

Basic usage

Bind a variable to v-model in <el-input-number> element and you are set.

Tips

When inputting invalid string to the input box, input value will emit NaN to the upper layer as result of error

item.title: Progress
item.description: Progress is used to show the progress of current operation, and inform the user the current status. Basic Usage Viwer Source Code Circular progress bar You can specify type attr...
item.content:encoded:
Progress is used to show the progress of current operation, and inform the user the current status.

Basic Usage

item.title: Select
item.description: When there are plenty of options, use a drop-down menu to display and select desired ones. This component requires the wrap when used in SSR (eg: Nuxt (https://nuxt.com/v3)) and...
item.content:encoded:
When there are plenty of options, use a drop-down menu to display and select desired ones.

Tips

This component requires the <client-only></client-only> wrap when used in SSR (eg: Nuxt) and SSG (eg: VitePress).

Basic usage

v-model is the value of el-option that is currently selected.

item.title: Avance
item.description: Drag the slider within a fixed range. Basic usage The current value is displayed when the slider is being dragged. Customize the initial value of the slider by setting the bindi...
item.content:encoded:
Drag the slider within a fixed range.

Basic usage

The current value is displayed when the slider is being dragged.

Customize the initial value of the slider by setting the binding value.

item.title: Switch
item.description: Switch is used for switching between two opposing states. Basic usage Bind v-model to a Boolean typed variable. The --el-switch-on-color and --el-switch-off-color CSS variables ...
item.content:encoded:
Switch is used for switching between two opposing states.

Basic usage

Bind v-model to a Boolean typed variable. The --el-switch-on-color and --el-switch-off-color CSS variables decides the background color in two states.

item.title: Tags
item.description: Used for marking and selection. Basic Usage Use the type attribute to define Tag's type. In addition, the color attribute can be used to set the background color of the Tag. Viw...
item.content:encoded:
Used for marking and selection.

Basic Usage

Use the type attribute to define Tag's type. In addition, the color attribute can be used to set the background color of the Tag.

It is a panel with 3 general actions. Option:

Clear Action

This Action is used to delete or clear the content of the panel
